sentences.sentence: Apropos (of) what you were just saying...
All my suggestions apropos the script were accepted.
sentences.translation: 我有关该剧本的所有建议都被采纳了。

sentences.sentence: She was no longer sure of her position. Apropos of that, it was clearly time for more persuasion.
sentences.translation: 她对自己的立场不再胸有成竹。谈及此，显然正是做更多说服工作的时候。
